H0.text: Which common mineral is used to make casts, moulds, blackboard chalk and plaster of Paris. Calcite

H1.text: Which common mineral is used to make casts, moulds, blackboard chalk and plaster of Paris. Halite

H2.text: Which common mineral is used to make casts, moulds, blackboard chalk and plaster of Paris. Kaolinite

H3.text: Which common mineral is used to make casts, moulds, blackboard chalk and plaster of Paris. Gypsum

A4.text: Plaster of Paris becomes regular gypsum, which hardens and is useful for casting and construction.

A5.text: Gypsum is the main constituent in many forms of plaster, drywall and blackboard or sidewalk chalk.
